data.message: This is amazing. My 6th grade teacher asked me what racism is. It was only my second month living in America. I never understood what that word means. Now I do. People hating on other people because they are not like them. But then again when a gay or lesbian stands next to a straight person, I don't see a difference. Two eyes a nose a mouth. I do see a likeness between all haters. You were raised to hate. Not to love.

replies.message: Sodoma and Gomorrah,no less.
i disagree, you cant help on individual looks but you can help the way a person acts, homosexuality is wrong according to GOD, i dont hate gays just the sin and i cant support sin.

Hey Frank by your comment I'm going to assume you're against LGBT, though some one who has Spec-ops in their name, and a call of duty profile picture I wouldn't expect much more than complete idiocy and intolerance. That's just my two cents.

I HATE murder, rape, molestation, lies, and homosexuality. I DON'T hate the people that do them. To hate wrong is not bad folks but to hate people is very wrong. The wages of sin is death "spiritual death." Which means eternity in a lake of fire. God said that, I didn't. Hate Him. If you have no substitution for your sin (Jesus), you are in trouble.  

Here is a scripture letting us know that hate is part of becoming godly. I even hate the sins I have done in the past. They put Love personified on the cross. 

Proverbs 8:13 "The fear of the LORD is to HATE EVIL: pride, and arrogancy, and the evil way, and the froward mouth, do I hate."
Please do not put two consenting adults engaging in what they what to do in the same league as murder or rape. We are not and should not be burdened by your religion.
hai

I don't hate anyone that is gay.  However, I believe the Bible is God's word and God doesn't change.  Homosexuality is a sin just like adultery is a sin or taking drugs is a sin and the list can go on and on.  I don't hate the sinners, I hate the sin.

Hating is a two way street, except liberals never see the hatred and violence emanating from themelves. Take a real good look at the Truth, see how liberals and progressives riot, destroy and bully America into seeing things their way! You will never see such hate and violence at conservative or Tea Party protests! Before anyone spouts off on this, back it up with proof instead of just ramping up your mouth!
Go back where you come from there's gonna be a war here.
